title: Anthropic plans an IPO as early as 2026, FT reports
description: Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup backed by Alphabet's Google and Amazon.com , has hired the law firm Wilson Sonsini to prepare for an initial public offering that could take place as early as 2026, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.

title: AI’s impact could worsen world’s rich and poor gaps: UN report
description: behind the hoopla over the promise of artificial intelligence lay difficult realities, including how such technology might affect people already disadvantaged in a data-driven world. a new report by the united nations development programme notes most of the gains from ai are likely to be reaped by wealthy nations unless steps are taken to use its power to help close gaps in access to basic needs, as well as such advanced know-how. the report released on tuesday likens the situation to the “great divergence”
content:

title: Vultr to invest $1 billion in Ohio AI cluster using AMD chips
description: Dec 2 (Reuters) - Cloud infrastructure company Vultr said on Tuesday it would invest more than $1 billion to launch a new artificial intelligence cluster powered by Advanced Micro Devices' processors at a new data center in Springfield, Ohio.
content:
Dec 2 (Reuters) - Cloud infrastructure company Vultr said on Tuesday it would invest more than $1 billion to launch a new artificial intelligence cluster powered by Advanced Micro Devices' processors at a new data center in Springfield, Ohio.

title: Anthropic acquires developer tool startup Bun to scale AI coding
description: Dec 2 (Reuters) - Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic said on Tuesday it has acquired Bun, which helps developers run and manage codes more effectively, as the Claude maker looks to boost the speed and stability of its coding agent.
content:

title: You Can Use AI to Manage Your Time as a Student. Here's How It Can Help
description: I spoke with students about common time-management pitfalls and came up with a list of artificial intelligence tools that can help you find your balance.

title: Some ChatGPT users see temporary outage
description: OpenAI confirmed that its artificial intelligence chatbot service saw a spike in errors before it applied fixes it was keeping an eye on.
content:
Dec. 2 (UPI) -- ChatGPT malfunctioned for some users on Tuesday, before the company that operates the popular artificial intelligence chatbot announced fixes.

title: Oracle Fear Gauge Closes at Highest Since 2009 on AI Worries
description: A risk gauge on Oracle Corp. debt closed at the highest level since the financial crisis after a flood of bond sales from tech giants amplified concerns that a bubble is forming in the artificial-intelligence industry.
content:
